thread.title: Container Tracking ensures that your shipment is always 'just a click away'
thread.title_full: Container Tracking ensures that your shipment is always 'just a click away' - maritime global news

author: Aiswarya Lakshmi
title: Container Tracking ensures that your shipment is always 'just a click away'
text:
"Our 24 x 7 multi-referential container tracking facility ensures that your shipment is always 'just a click away'!," says CMA CGM.
CMA CGM Container tracking is available anytime anywhere- from your personal computer, laptop, tablet or mobile device guaranteeing you virtual accessibility from any device or location. Our container tracking facility also provides the ease of search using any of the three key shipment referential - Booking Number, BL Number or Container Number, in effect, ensuring you maximum visibility at all stages of the shipment cycle with minimum pre-requisites. CMA CGM container tracking is connected to competent IT systems and are equipped to provide the most updated status of shipments at any point of time, with clear visibility on past, current and provisional (planned) moves, placing the customer a step ahead in planning supply chain management. Michael Rabaud, eCommerce Manager CMA CGM Group said: Driven by several smart enhancements, CMA CGM eBusiness container tracking addresses the market requirements in an innovative way. Today, our online tracking facilitates solutions to 3.7 million customer requests in a month. While receiving this achievement as a market endorsement, we certainly consider the increasing patronage as a driving force towards improving CMA CGM eBusiness services." "Before the end of the year, you will be able to subscribe to the main tracking movement thanks to our Notification Center," he added.
